content:
Description: This intent can be used to research different brands and models of smart TV sets, without any specific brand or model in mind.

brand=Apple
similar values: LG, Samsung, Sony, Roku 

price_range=None
size=50

similar values: 55, 65


Intent2: (SelectSmartTV)

Description: This intent can be used to select a specific brand and model of smart TV set. 
brand=Apple 
model=none, 
features=smart controls

Intent3:  (OrderSmartTV)
DEscription: This intent can be used to place an order for a specific brand and model of smart TV set. 
model=None, 
delivery_date= September 18, December 21

possible values: any future date
 
Intent4:  (ArrangeInstallation)

installation_date=None, installation_time=None

 Description: This intent can be used to arrange for the installation of the new smart TV set. 

Intent5: (ConfirmDelivery)
Description: This intent can be used to confirm the delivery of the new smart TV set
delivery_date=December 12.
possible values: any future date

Create a numbered list of the intents that would match the following utterance: 
"I need a new smart TV that can be delivered on Dec 12th"
Do not add descriptions of intents.

chosen:
The following intents are applicable to the given utterance:
1. (OrderSmartTV)
2. (ConfirmDelivery)
The second intent matches because it includes an intention to make a delivery on a specific date, which is Dec 12th. The first intent does not apply because there's no mention of selecting a particular model or brand of TV.
rejected:
The following intents are relevant to the given utterance:
1. (OrderSmartTV)
2. (ConfirmDelivery)
The second intent confirms delivery of the new smart TV set and is the correct choice because it aligns with the user's statement about needing a TV that can be delivered on a specific date. The possible value for delivery_date is any future date, which means that Dec 12th would be acceptable. Therefore, the correct intent would be Intent5: (ConfirmDelivery).
